content: --अचर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} moveable and immoveable; चराचराणां भूतानां कु क्षिराधारतां गतः <ls>Ku. 6. 67</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">2. 5</ls>; <ls>Bg. 11. 43.</ls> {2} wished, desired. {3} shaking, trembling. (--रं {1} the aggregate of all created things, the world; <ls>Ms. 1. 57</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 1.">63</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">3. 75</ls>; <ls>Bg. 11. 7</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">9. 10.</ls> {2} the sky, the atmosphere. {3} heaven. (--री a young woman.
